title: [Oleander House, Scullery]
description: Small and compact, the scullery is surrounded by tidy shelves and marble counters with birdseye maple cupboards beneath.  Forested globes are housed beneath the lowest of the shelves, illuminating a cutting board, soapstone basin, and a series of stove-topped ovens.  A bright white door in the northern wall leads outside.
room.location: Oleander House, inside the city of Vornavis Proper
